text: Audrina Patridge & Ryan Cabrera Are ‘ Getting Pretty Serious ’ As She Attends His Concert In LA! Ryan Cabrera had his number one fan in the audience at his concert in El Lay last night — Audrina Patridge! As you know, the two have been spending more time together as of late and are said to be “ getting pretty serious ”! Related : Are Colton Haynes & Jeff Leatham Splitting?! The old flames ( who were first linked in 2010 ) were seen having “ a blast ” at the show, and E! News reports Ryan ’ s musicianship is one of the former reality star ’ s favorite things about him!
